message: I'm excited to sell this great product to you, Bob! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I can do a little better than that, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. Can you consider that?
I can do a little better than that, Bob! I'm willing to give you a small discount, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $94.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $94. I'd be willing to meet you at $91. Can you consider that?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $92, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $93.
I'm glad we're close, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $93. I'd be willing to meet you at $90, which is the price I was originally looking for. Can you consider that?
